channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Billion-Dollar Data Centers Are Taking Over the World
item.description: The battle for AI dominance has left a large footprint—and it’s only getting bigger and more expensive.

item.title: How Much Melatonin Should You Be Taking? (2026)
item.description: Many people rely on the sleep aid melatonin to help them get a more restful night’s sleep. But is it safe? And how much is too much?

item.title: Why WeTransfer’s co-founder is building another file transfer service
item.description: WeTransfer co-founder Nalden has a new file transfer service that users can use without logging in.

item.title: People Who Drink Bottled Water on a Daily Basis Ingest 90,000 More Microplastic Particles Each Year
item.description: Drinking water in plastic bottles contains countless particles too small to see. New research finds that people who drink water from them on a daily b...

item.title: The 33 top health and wellness startups from Disrupt Startup Battlefield
item.description: Here is the full list of the health and wellness Startup Battlefield 200 selectees, along with a note on what made us select them for the competition.

item.title: 8 Best Plant-Based Meal Delivery Services and Kits (2025), Tested, Tasted, and Reviewed
item.description: Convenience isn’t just for meat eaters anymore. These plant-based meal kits and delivery services bring healthy preprepared meals and meal kits to you...

item.title: The Google Pixel Watch 4 made me like smartwatches again
item.description: Google's Pixel Watch 4 is an excellent smartwatch with fast charging and great design.

item.title: 10 Best Drones (2025): Flight-Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Whether you want to battle Star Wars spaceships or shoot a cinematic masterpiece, one of these drones is going to be perfect for you.

item.title: A guide to choosing the right Apple Watch
item.description: The gap between Apple's standard and budget smart watches has never felt smaller.

item.title: MayimFlow wants to stop data center leaks before they happen
item.description: Leaks cause damage, down time, and cost money. MayimFlow's founder John Khazraee wants to change that.
